'''''Dew Song''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must reach the Max Level of the [[Fountain of Lucine]] in the [[Court of Fontaine]].
